All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BluetoothServerExecutor
The BluetoothServerExecutor interface represents the contract for executing the Bluetooth Server.
BluetoothServerExecutorApplication
The BluetoothServerExecutorApplication class represents a Bluetooth server application that listens for incoming connections.
Connection
The Connection class provides methods for managing Bluetooth communication and checking the allowed devices based on the configuration file.
DataType
The DataType enumeration facilitates HTTP POST to a related endpoint, corresponding to a specific data type, to the server.
EnvironmentType
The EnvironmentType enumeration is designed to facilitate the recognition of different environments within the application.
HTTPPOST
The HTTPPOST class represents an HTTP POST request thread that sends data received from a remote device via Bluetooth communication to a server using the specified data type.
Logging
The Logging class provides a simple utility for generating textual logs related to the operation of the Bluetooth Server.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Bluetooth server application.
RemoteConnection
The RemoteConnection class represents a thread handling an incoming Bluetooth connection request.
Server
The Server interface defines the contract for initializing the execution of the Bluetooth server within the application.
ServerApplication
The ServerApplication class represents a singleton implementation of a Bluetooth server application.
UUIDgenerator
The UUIDgenerator class provides functionality for generating and accessing Universally Unique Identifiers (UUIDs).
